We booked a Cabana to ensure we were granted access to the pool for our girls trip. We were so excited for this experience, but that very quickly vanished after we were shown to our cabana. The tables and chairs were very dated and dirty, Service was lackluster at best and the pool was not as special as it was made out on their website.We waited over 20 minutes before the server came by, we ordered lunch and a pitcher each as we were planning an all day pool day. It took over 40 minutes for a stale premade sandwich to come and our super sweet drinks. They did bring us a bunch of bottled water. The server said she would bring us Ice, but she never did.The  - Heated -  pool was ICE cold; ever with it being 89 it took awhile to get acclimated. We met and chatted with some wonderful people, but they were commenting on how sad it was to spend  - 400 for a Cabana and only have one server for the whole pool. So I know we were not the only ones very disappointed with the overall experience.We ended up spending only 4 hours at the pool. Each finishing our pitchers and swearing their was no alcohol in them.  - We drank them over a 3 hour period, as our first hour was waiting. - Our server came by twice the entire time after delivering our food - drinks, we asked for ice again the first time she came by, and yet we still didn - t get it. So after the second time she only came in and removed our pitchers and didn - t even ask if she could get us anything else. Our Cabana was  - 10, and it had a ugly Blue Tarp in the back while the others had pretty Floral backgrounds. Really felt like we were shoved in the corner and forgot about. In spending  - 400 for a Cabana, we really expected a better experience over all. The TV only had a handful of Channels, would be really great if they offered some music options.Read more
